title: FTX Can Now Sell Its $1B Stake in Anthropic to Repay Creditors
description: The value of the AI company's shares held by FTX has doubled since the last time a sale was contemplated.

title: Max Keiser Warns of Government Seizing Bitcoin in ETFs — Predicts 1987-Style Crash as BTC Rises to $500K
description: Bitcoin proponent Max Keiser has warned of potential government seizure of bitcoin held in spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs). He additionally issued a stark warning about a looming 1987-style crash, while simultaneously predicting that the bitcoin’s price will surge past $500,000. Max Keiser’s Crash and Bitcoin Seizure Warnings Bitcoin advocate Max Keiser expressed concerns about spot […]

title: Crypto Asset Inflows Soar As JPM Turns Bullish; $GFOX Offers 10X Potential
description: Trends and attitudes are constantly shifting in the crypto world, as evidenced by people like BlackRock’s Larry Fink (once an outspoken critic of Bitcoin) suddenly becoming one of crypto’s greatest proponents. Now it seems the same phenomenon has just occurred at the once-staunchly anti-crypto JP Morgan. As crypto asset inflows surge to record highs and […]
